fusionlibrary.fusion_models.crossmodal_attÔÉÅ

Crossmodal multi-head attention model. This model uses the self attention and cross modal attention between the two modalities: tabular and image.

Classes

CrossmodalMultiheadAttention(pred_type,¬†...)

Crossmodal multi-head attention model.

ParentFusionModel(pred_type,¬†data_dims,¬†params)

Parent class for all fusion models.
class fusionlibrary.fusion_models.crossmodal_att.CrossmodalMultiheadAttention(pred_type, data_dims, params)[source]ÔÉÅ

Bases: ParentFusionModel, Module

Crossmodal multi-head attention model. This model uses the self attention and cross modal attention between the two modalities: tabular and image.

method_nameÔÉÅ

Name of the method.

Type:

str

modality_typeÔÉÅ

Type of modality.

Type:

str

fusion_typeÔÉÅ

Type of fusion.

Type:

str

pred_typeÔÉÅ

Type of prediction to be performed.

Type:

str

mod1_layersÔÉÅ

Dictionary containing the layers of the first modality.

Type:

dict

img_layersÔÉÅ

Dictionary containing the layers of the image data.

Type:

dict

fused_layersÔÉÅ

Sequential layer containing the fused layers.

Type:

nn.Sequential

attentionÔÉÅ

Multihead attention layer. Takes in 50 features as input.

Type:

nn.MultiheadAttention

img_denseÔÉÅ

Linear layer. Takes in 50 features as input. This is the output of the multihead attention layer.

Type:

nn.Linear

to50ÔÉÅ

Linear layer. Takes in the number of features of the fused layers as input.

Type:

nn.Linear

reluÔÉÅ

ReLU activation function.

Type:

nn.ReLU

tab1dropsÔÉÅ

List containing the dropout layers for the tabular modality.

Type:

list

final_predictionÔÉÅ

Sequential layer containing the final prediction layers. The final prediction layers take in 200 features.

Type:

nn.Sequential

forward(x)[source]ÔÉÅ

Forward pass of the model.

https://github.com/rsinghlab/MADDi/blob/main/training/train_all_modalities.py
